timeline.message:
Fix falsely starting player service when previewing video

Signed-off-by: tobiasKaminsky <tobias@kaminsky.me>

timeline.bodyText:
This looks like a solution for this case.
However, because stopAudio() results in Intent being sent to a service and thus it starts the service, the call is simply not safe to use in other places. I think we should internally call Service.stopSelf() if there is nothing to play as well.
timeline.author: ezaquarii

replies.bodyText:
In PreviewMediaFragment onStart() I tried to bind to an existing player service.
Reason is:

start a long audio file
start a video
audio stops, video sound is played, but audio notification is still there (and cannot be resumed)

So my quick idea was to bind to audio service when starting video and stop audio service.
But this does not work.
